mapper.select: SELECT wa.article_id as id, wa.title as Title, wa.description as Description, wa.picurl as PicUrl, wa.url as Url, wa.type as atype, wa.content as content, wa.create_name as createName, wa.create_time as createTime, wa.update_name as updateName, wa.update_time as updateTime, wka.kwd_name FROM wx_kwd_resp as wka,wx_article as wa,wx_rel_article_account as wraa WHERE wraa.account_id=#{userid} and wraa.mutiarticle_id=0 and wa.article_id=wraa.article_id and wraa.aa_id=wka.article_id and wka.kwd_name=#{content}
SELECT wkr.kwd_id as id, wkr.kwd_name as keyname FROM wx_kwd_resp AS wkr WHERE wkr.kwd_name=#{keyname}

SELECT wa.article_id as id, wa.title as Title, wa.description as Description, wa.picurl as PicUrl, wa.url as Url, wa.type as atype, wa.content as content, wa.create_name as createName, wa.create_time as createTime, wa.update_name as updateName, wa.update_time as updateTime FROM wx_article AS wa INNER JOIN wx_rel_article_account AS wraa ON wa.article_id=wraa.article_id and wraa.mutiarticle_id=#{manarticleId} ORDER BY wa.article_id DESC

SELECT wkr.kwd_id as id, wkr.kwd_name as keyname, wkr.article_type as article_type, wkr.article_id as article_id, wkr.account_id as account_id, wkr.create_name as createName, wkr.create_time as createTime, wkr.update_time as updateTime, wkr.remark as remark, wa.title as title, wa.content as content FROM wx_kwd_resp AS wkr LEFT JOIN wx_rel_article_account AS wraa ON wkr.article_id = wraa.aa_id LEFT JOIN wx_article AS wa ON wa.article_id=wraa.article_id and wkr.account_id=#{accountId} where 1=1 and wkr.kwd_id=#{keyId}

SELECT wkr.kwd_id as id, wkr.kwd_name as keyname, wkr.article_type as article_type, wkr.article_id as article_id, wkr.account_id as account_id, wkr.create_name as createName, wkr.create_time as createTime, wkr.update_time as updateTime, wkr.remark as remark, wa.title as title, wa.content as content FROM wx_kwd_resp AS wkr LEFT JOIN wx_rel_article_account AS wraa ON wkr.article_id = wraa.aa_id LEFT JOIN wx_article AS wa ON wa.article_id=wraa.article_id and wkr.account_id=#{accountId} where 1=1
limit #{lowerLimit},#{upperLimit}
select count(*) FROM wx_kwd_resp AS wkr LEFT JOIN wx_article AS wa on wkr.article_id=wa.article_id WHERE 1=1
